name: Beef Spring Rolls Filling
author: unknown
ingredients:
**Marinade:
- 500g beef mince
- 2 tsp corn starch
- 1 tsp sugar
- 4 tsp soy sauce
- 1/2 tsp white pepper

**Main:
- 30g dried shitake mushrooms
- 200g (1/2) cabbage
- 2 medium carrots
- 2 bunches of spring onions
- 4 cloves of garlic
- 2 thumb sized pieces of ginger
- 4 tbsp oyster sauce
instructions:
- Marinade the beef mince for 30 minutes.
- Whilst the beef marinades, soak the shitake mushrroms in hot water until soft.
- Thinly slice the soaked mushrooms and all of the vegetables.

- Fry off the meat and set aside.
- Fry off the garlic and ginger, then add the rest of the vegetables and fry until soft - the bottom of the pan should stay dry.
- Mix the vegetables and meat with 4 tbsp oyster sauce.
- Fill shop-bought spring roll wrappers with the mixture, and use a 1:1 slurry of corn starch and water to stick them together.
